publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7732 John Park: Keep Ardroy Open—That the Parliament notes Fife Council’s proposal to close the Ardroy Outdoor Education Centre; expresses its concern at this proposal; notes the health, social and developmental benefits that it considers outdoor experiences at Ardroy have given to hundreds of children for over 40 years and values these experiences for the long-term development of healthy adults in Scotland; considers it important to keep Ardroy affordable and accessible for children from all backgrounds, and opposes this proposed closure.

S3M-7732 Keep Ardroy Open (lodged on 18 January 2011) Charlie Gordon*, Trish Godman*, Ken Macintosh*, David Stewart*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Murdo Fraser*, Claire Baker*, Mary Mulligan*
